scripts.test: nodemon --exec 'npm run clean && npm run build && npm run lint && node dist/index.js' --watch src -e ts,ejs
scripts.test:win: nodemon --exec npm run test:win:command --watch src -e ts,ejs
scripts.test:win:command: npm run clean:win && npm run build:win && npm run lint && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: tsc && cp -r views dist/views && cp -r public dist/public && cp -r .env dist/.env && cp -r package.json dist/package.json && mv dist/src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/src
scripts.build:win: tsc && echo d | xcopy /d /s /e views dist\views && echo d |xcopy /d /s /e public dist\public && echo f | xcopy /f .env dist\.env && echo f | xcopy /f package.json dist\package.json && xcopy /s /i dist\src\* dist\ && rmdir /s /q dist\src || echo ""
